医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
治疗联盟在迷幻治疗中的重要作用药物效应主导了全国有关迷幻药治疗的讨论，但一项新的研究表明，当谈到通过迷幻药辅助治疗减少抑郁症时，最重要的是治疗师和研究参与者之间的牢固关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/The-vital-role-of-therapeutic-alliances-in-psychedelic-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/The-vital-role-of-therapeutic-alliances-in-psychedelic-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3c7d63c5-5d16-4fef-9fcc-9bf7a9ce8e9a Tue, 23 Apr 2024 02:17:00 -0400 The vital role of therapeutic alliances in psychedelic treatment
揭示社区药房如何帮助戒烟工作一项新的研究表明，社区药店可能在帮助人们戒烟方面发挥关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Unveiling-how-community-pharmacies-aid-smoking-cessation-efforts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Unveiling-how-community-pharmacies-aid-smoking-cessation-efforts.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dff81e41-7883-4345-88a6-a1ac0e45bd84 Tue, 23 Apr 2024 02:09:40 -0400 Unveiling how community pharmacies aid smoking cessation efforts
Aster DM Healthcare 揭示了对抗 PCOS 症状的最佳食物2024 年 4 月，全球范围内与多囊卵巢综合症 (PCOS) 相关的 Google 搜索量创下历史新高，表明人们对了解和管理这种疾病的关注和兴趣日益浓厚。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Aster-DM-Healthcare-reveals-top-foods-to-combat-PCOS-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Aster-DM-Healthcare-reveals-top-foods-to-combat-PCOS-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9f449aea-1903-4e20-9be8-4be55c8eb62b Tue, 23 Apr 2024 01:56:00 -0400 Aster DM Healthcare reveals top foods to combat PCOS symptoms
研究显示，痴呆症患者使用抗精神病药物的风险超出了之前的警报范围曼彻斯特大学、诺丁汉大学、爱丁堡大学和邓迪大学合作进行的一项新研究表明，与不使用抗精神病药物相比，痴呆症患者使用抗精神病药物会导致各种严重健康后果的风险更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Risks-of-antipsychotic-use-in-dementia-extend-beyond-previous-alerts-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Risks-of-antipsychotic-use-in-dementia-extend-beyond-previous-alerts-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=43a8cc04-7fe8-4fb4-9c3f-e79ef6650317 Tue, 23 Apr 2024 01:49:00 -0400 Risks of antipsychotic use in dementia extend beyond previous alerts, study shows
默克推出 Aptegra CHO 遗传稳定性测定，用于加速生物安全测试默克是一家领先的科技公司，推出了同类中第一个经过验证的一体化遗传稳定性测定。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Merck-Introduces-Aptegra-CHO-genic-stability-assay-for-accelerated-biosafety-testing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Merck-Introduces-Aptegra-CHO-genic-stability-assay-for-accelerated-biosafety-testing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ececf9f5-f4bb-4501-a56a-3a38e0b97acf Tue, 23 Apr 2024 01:43:00 -0400 Merck Introduces Aptegra CHO genetic stability assay for accelerated biosafety testing
回顾：妊娠期疫苗接种的促进因素和障碍伦敦大学圣乔治学院的研究人员发现了孕妇接种百日咳、流感和 Covid-19 疫苗的主要障碍，并概述了解决疫苗犹豫问题的建议。该结果来自首次同类综述，并于今天发表在《PLOS ONE》杂志上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Review-Facilitators-and-barriers-to-vaccination-uptake-in-pregnancy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Review-Facilitators-and-barriers-to-vaccination-uptake-in-pregnancy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1145cbf8-6c12-495d-a306-b41839226ad6 Tue, 23 Apr 2024 01:38:00 -0400 Review: Facilitators and barriers to vaccination uptake in pregnancy
健康的植物性饮食可降低西班牙老年人的死亡风险一项历时 12 年的研究表明，适度坚持健康的素食饮食可显着降低 65 岁以上西班牙成年人因心血管疾病和所有原因导致的死亡风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Healthy-plant-based-diets-cut-mortality-risks-for-Spains-seniors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Healthy-plant-based-diets-cut-mortality-risks-for-Spains-seniors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=91927ac0-9f84-4d10-9ba2-98b1b670b9c0 Tue, 23 Apr 2024 01:34:00 -0400 Healthy plant-based diets cut mortality risks for Spain's seniors
伦敦大学学院研究显示子宫压力塑造面部特征伦敦大学学院研究人员领导的一项新研究发现，子宫内的身体因素，而不仅仅是遗传因素，会影响神经嵴细胞的正常发育，神经嵴细胞是形成面部特征的胚胎干细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Womb-Pressure-shapes-facial-features-UCL-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Womb-Pressure-shapes-facial-features-UCL-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c536eb71-ab14-45a1-b43f-55​​51a81504b9 Tue, 23 Apr 2024 01:33:24 -0400 Womb pressure shapes facial features, UCL study reveals
南澳大学研究强调了治疗盆腔疼痛的关键疼痛概念南澳大利亚大学的一项新研究将人们的骨盆疼痛经历置于疼痛教育的前沿，以制定更好的疼痛管理策略并改善结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/UniSA-research-highlights-key-pain-concepts-for-managing-pelvic-pain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/UniSA-research-highlights-key-pain-concepts-for-managing-pelvic-pain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1f12cc4e-b57c-4cb9-9ef8-d2845f28b28a Tue, 23 Apr 2024 01:30:00 -0400 UniSA research highlights key pain concepts for managing pelvic pain
FUJIFILM Healthcare Europe 推出用于内窥镜手术的 EndoGel 培训模型FUJIFILM Healthcare Europe GmbH 很高兴地宣布推出 EndoGel，这是一种专为执行内镜粘膜下剥离术 (ESD) 和经口内镜肌切开术 (POEM) 手术而设计的培训模型https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/FUJIFILM-Healthcare-Europe-in​​troduces-EndoGel-training-model-for-endooscopy-procedures.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/FUJIFILM-Healthcare-Europe-in​​troduces-EndoGel-training-model-for-endooscopy-procedures.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=478e92c8-6dee-41a5-8981-3fb1ce62b7a7 Tue, 23 Apr 2024 01:26:00 -0400 FUJIFILM Healthcare Europe introduces EndoGel training model for endoscopic procedures
